io.confluent.ksql.api.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.api.server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the API server. On start-up it deploys multiple server verticles to spread the load across available cores.
